name: strategically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that helps to achieve a plan, for example in business or politics: Central Asia is a fragile region, politically weak but strategically important. Her scarf was strategically placed to hide a tear in her shirt.
in a way that provides military forces with an advantage: US forces seized two strategically important airfields. Imagine a military that could strategically change the weather over an enemy to gain an advantage.
More examplesFewer examplesHer desk was strategically placed so that she could keep her eye on the naughty children.A strategically positioned scarf hides her tattoo.A military strike is technically and strategically problematic.To New Brunswick, strategically placed beside a friendly enemy, the war brought prosperity.
